title: Outbound visitor growth in Africa 2018 to 2022
summary: Overall Year-over-year visitor growth has decreased over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2020.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest Year-over-year visitor growth, of value 6.1 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Year-over-year visitor growth about 3.3 was reached at Year 2020
